select t1.user_acct as userAcct, t1.user_name as userName, t1.sex as sex, t1.phone as phone, t1.mail as mail, t1.idcard as idCard from t_sys_user t1, t_info_client t2, t_info_store t3 where t1.user_code = t2.user_id and t2.invite_code = t3.invite_code and t1.role_id = 4 and t3.user_id = #{userId}
and t1.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and t1.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and t2.create_time desc

select user_acct as userAcct, user_name as userName, sex as sex, phone as phone, mail as mail, idcard as idCard from t_sys_user where role_id = 4
and user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
order by create_time desc
